## YieldRequest.written property

Optionally includes the global variables that were written during script evaluation, before the current function call.

The values of the provided map represents the version of the global scope that became current after the corresponding variable was last written.

This property may be omitted unless the script is evaluated with the `track` option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
written?: Map<string, number>;
```
